import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FAQSection=()=>{const[activeIndex,setActiveIndex]=useState(null);const faqs=[{question:"Are Toothpaste Bits good for sensitive teeth?",answer:["Yes, our Bits are safe for sensitive teeth. ];const toggleFAQ=index=>{setActiveIndex(activeIndex===index?null:index);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{width:"100%",padding:'20px 50px',margin:'0 auto'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{style:{fontSize:'2.7rem',padding:"70px",borderBottom:'1px solid black',textAlign:'center'},children:"FAQs"}),faqs.map((faq,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginBottom:'15px',borderBottom:'1px solid black',paddingBottom:'15px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'space-between',alignItems:'center',cursor:'pointer',padding:'1px 0'},onClick:()=>toggleFAQ(index),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{fontSize:'1.35rem',fontWeight:'400',margin:0},children:faq.question}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{fontSize:'1.5rem',transition:'transform 0.3s ease',transform:activeIndex===index?'rotate(45deg)':'rotate(0)'},children:"+"})]}),activeIndex===index&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{padding:'0 0 15px 0'},children:faq.answer.map((paragraph,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{fontSize:'1.1rem',lineHeight:'1.8',marginBottom:'15px'},children:paragraph},i))})]},index))]});};export default FAQSection;
